Make sure GO Launcher EX V2.58 or above and GO Locker v1.05 has been installed;2. Click âMENUâ->Preferencesâ->Theme Settingsâ->GO Locker---->My lockerâ to choose the theme;Please let me know if you meet any bugs or want any improvement!E-mail: golauncher@goforandroid.com

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is a great app. Be sure to change it\'s wallpaper to match your homescreen. Looks beautiful with Mood ICS Pro LWP wallpaper!! But yes, please add shortcuts to phone & messaging. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice locker
reviews.comment: It is very nice style and design for go locker. And it could be nicer if u can add four items while unlocking this locker.
reviews.author: Aizat Zulkifli

reviews.title: Good,  but..
reviews.comment: I like this theme very much. But could you add a feature that whenever there is a message and it will notify me that?  Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needing one app after another
reviews.comment: Some of ur app.s are great but what\'s with having to download so many??!! Y can\'t u condense the apps so ur not usung so much memory getting what u want?!!!!!! Put them in package form and make it easy to get and have all the apps u need to run on the Phones  ,
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I like it very much. It\'s my favourite locker. I look forward to see 1 more shortcut (camera, normal unlock + phone or text)
reviews.author: Miko\305\202aj Zieli\305\204ski

reviews.title: Boooooo
reviews.comment: This suck.....not showing date and Time.....its hiding.....widget locker is better than this,uninstalling right now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good and smooth
reviews.comment: It\'s a good locker but still lacks some polish especially on the shortcuts likw music and etc.. Besides that, it\'s worth the money
reviews.author: Yen Tzer Tan

reviews.title: Nice and simple
reviews.comment: ... but I\'d still like to be able to customize my lock screen app selection.
reviews.author: Oscar English

reviews.title: More buttons should be available
reviews.comment: I love it but u need to introduce more buttons just like real ics lock screen then i might rate it 5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Messaging shortcut
reviews.comment: This would be perfect if it had a messaging shortcut and phone shortcut instead of just a camera one. Also an unread message count would be better for using the full screen mode.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sony erricsson xperia live with walkman
reviews.comment: I have a music app hot button in my phone and in locked condition when i press it the lock screen bypasses the pattern lock and opens the music app. I would like you people to fix it. Plus a missed call and unread message and unread mail notification will be great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: I love the theme except having more customization would be nice. Like the fourkey theme. I would use it but I don\'t like sliding down to unlock. Update with more customization and notifications for 5 stars!
reviews.author: Robert Thompson

reviews.comment: Brilliant! Should be an option for battery status being shown. But still a five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it, works as advertised and doesn\'t have home button issue
reviews.comment: I see where a lot of ppl state it will go straight to home screen and override lock screen by pressing the home button. I have not had that problem. Right after I installed golocker and chose a theme I pressed on the home button and a screen came up asking for the \"home screen button default\". The options were golauncher, golocker, and htcsense. Well u choose \"golauncher\", and so far my phone will not go to home screen by pressing home button. Hope this helps. Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really cool but...
reviews.comment: Power button long press options does not work. It also need phone and message shortcuts and notifications.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Change shortcut?
reviews.comment: Is it possible to change the shortcut on the left? I\'d rather have it go to my texts instead of my camera. Other than that great theme :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S
reviews.comment: I love this go locker theme , it looks much better than some , goes great with my go launcher
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I would give five stars, but can u add a custimize button on the lock screen? Thnx -(the camera and the unlock button is too less)
reviews.author: vivian zhao

reviews.title: nice theme
reviews.comment: I always loved ICS
reviews.author: Marco Rafael

reviews.title: Date format?
reviews.comment: This is great, especially when I discovered I could make it use my home screen background :) Only have one issue, I can\'t set the date format to text instead of numbers.  I can only get things like 30-06-12 but I want Saturday, June 30
reviews.author: A Google User
